P1:
We have an invite-only process to limit the high number of applications we get and to maintain the high quality standards of our analysis and discussions.
Don't be discouraged, we're still open to accepting anybody who is interested.
P2:
We don't discriminate. We accept all types of investors & traders, from newbies to seasonsed professionals alike!
We only ask that upon being an successful applicant you make an effort to contribute to general discussions.
P3: This does not mean that we expect you to be producing industry-standard technical anlysis. You can contribute by suggesting a new investment opportunity, showing off your trading techniques or just popping in to say 'Hi!' once in a while
